alert.note: Alert for Northern Fulton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 3:51AM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 to 60 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Fulton County. In Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Very strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall at elevations greater than 1500 feet. Snowfall rates of 1 inch per hour are possible this morning, especially in the southern Greens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
